column5: Just a heads up  For the month of April, Napa auto parts has Seafoam on for $7.99 a bottle.  Cheers, Mark
...time to stock up for the season....thanks for the heads up.....
Thanks Mark.  Everything runs better with addition of seafoam in my opinion.
Great price....just convinced my buddy to pick up a can while we were in Canadian Tire..for 12 a can. So i went and bought 14 cans
It 's like a mechanic in a can for only $7.99
Would this be good for adding to my mower gas or would it be unnecessary
It helps any gas powered item. Ethanol does a number on anything.
word up to this post, time to hit napa!
